user_query: I'm 22 years old newly married and already a money craze little [ __ ] so what do I do I go to the one place on Earth that befits my highest [Music] ambitions your job is connector which means that you will be dialing the phone over 500 times a day trying to connect me with wealthy business owners and until you pass your Series 7 that is all you're going to [ __ ] be doing sit sit just say you know last year I made over $300,000 the other guy you'll be working for he made over a million bucks that guy must be Jordan Belfort yeah yes sir Mark Hannah pleasure to meet you and you as well I see you've already met the village [ __ ] smile and dial and don't pick up your [ __ ] head until one hey [ __ ] him I'm the senior broker here he's just now did you really pitch a stock in your job interview I had to do something to stand out right sir I [ __ ] love that lunch today yeah right we don't start dialing at 9:30 because our clients are already answering the phone three two one let's I was hooked in seconds can't 4 pick up the [ __ ] phone Mark as well we don't give two [ __ ] about how technology works because all we care about is getting [ __ ] rich name of the game move the money from your client's pocket into your pocket right but if you can make a client's money at the same time it's advantageous to everyone of them correct no meanwhile he thinks he's getting [ __ ] rich which he is on paper but you and me the brokers we're taking home cold hard cash via commission [ __ ]

entities.entity_description: 월스트리트의 늑대는 주식 중개인의 성공과 탐욕을 다룬 영화이다
조던 벨포트는 22세에 결혼한 신입 주식 중개인으로, 부를 향한 야망을 가진 인물이다
마크 한나는 시니어 브로커로, 조던 벨포트에게 주식 중개업의 본질과 수수료를 통한 돈벌이 방식을 가르쳐주는 인물이다

relationships.relationship_description: 마크 한나는 월스트리트의 늑대에 등장하는 시니어 브로커 캐릭터이다
조던 벨포트는 마크 한나 밑에서 일하며 주식 중개업을 배운다
마크 한나는 조던 벨포트의 멘토로서 브로커의 수수료 시스템을 가르쳐준다

THE WOLF OF WALL STREET.description: THE WOLF OF WALL STREET -> THE WOLF OF WALL STREET
